name: Kill Ataraxia_Extra_10110
description:
The dialogue system failed to merge into the game. Extra content for Kill Ataraxia. The story behind all stories.

Although the game is a dark fantasy theme, it also discusses many ethical issues like revenge, eternity and the definition of human. 

The game has multiple endings. Please enjoy.
